title: Windows 7 AIO - X32x64
description:
Editions:

Home Basic 64Bit
Home Premium 64Bit
Professional 64Bit
Ultimate 64Bit
Enterprise 64Bit

Starter 32Bit
Home Basic 32Bit
Home Premium 32Bit
Professional 32Bit
Ultimate 32Bit
Enterprise 32Bit

System Requirements:
Windows 7 Minimum System Requirements (Excluded for Virtual Machine)
1GHz Processor
1GB RAM (x86) or 2GB (x64)
DirectX 9 Graphics Card
128 MB Video Memory
More than 40gb hard disk space

NOTE: you will have the choice to install OEM logo and information at setup.

If using Enterprise edition you must select a timezone to suit the chosen kms host, you will have this option before first login using the KMS activator.

Install:

1. Burn this .iso file into an empty DVD using any software(recommend imgburn) at THE SLOWEST SPEED AS POSSIBLE (x1 or x2 speed)

2. After which, insert the burned DVD into your DVD drive & restart your PC

3. Install your desired system

4. When activator box appears enter your Computers info

5. Enjoy Windows Seven!

Note: I've tested this two times on my virtual box and reformatted my personal laptop with it......it does work!
